Premium Figma Prototyping and Animation Library

Scaffold is a Figma Prototyping library composed of 285 Base design prototypes and animations for you to use in your design work. Built with a commitment to reusability, speed and flexibility, Scaffold helps you build complex, unique Figma prototypes quickly. Scaffold saves you countless hours building complex prototypes and stuck in connection spaghetti, giving you extra time to swork on what you do best — rad design work.

Learn More Buy Now

Scaffold Use Cases and Benefits

  • Quickly adding interactions to your existing designs using Scaffolds examples and best-practice demonstrations for rapid Figma prototyping
  • Prototype complex, multi-screen animations in no-time at all using Scaffolds flexible templates and pre-built connections and interactions
  • Show clients and colleagues smooth, animateds interactions in your mock-ups or designs

Who is Scaffold built for?

  • Designers who want to add quickly and easily add interactions, prototypes or animations to existing designs
  • Designers and Developers looking to explore different types of motion design available in Figma and ready to add to future designs
  • Design studios doing client work who want to easily add interaction to client work, without spending hours tweaking connections and frame interactions
  • Probably *not* for teams that have dedicated motion designers!

Package Details: What's Included

Scaffold is a premium Figma library of pre-built animations and design prototypes, designed and ready to drop into your projects. Built for reusability, speed, customization and flexibility. Ready to use on a full range of projects from client work to in-house designs to new product develop or side projects.

  • 285 Base Scaffold Prototypes
    The primary Scaffold Figma Library composed of 5 main categories, 61 core Prototype Animation Scaffolds, and an additional 191 variations on the base prototypes.
  • Desktop and Mobile Designs
    Prototypes and animations base templates built to be used in web and mobile design suitable for almost any kind of digital design work you need.
  • Flexible Animations
    Prototypes and animations include designs for mobile, web, marketing, social, gallery, ecommerce, buttons, links, menus and navigation.
  • Demo High Fidelity Prototypes
    Four example prototypes that show the power and flexibility of Scaffold, giving you inspiration for integrating prototyping into your own work.

FAQs and Extra Details:

  • How does the lifetime license work?
    Similar to Sketch, and Flowkit. All updates until Dec 2020 are included in the current price of $79.00 (single license) or $229.0 (team license). Future releases will be marked with a new version number.
  • Does Scaffold work with Sketch, Adobe XD, or InVision Studio?
    It's not recommended. Scaffold has been built based on custom animation and prototyping features in Figma. Because of that, you'll get the best results using Scaffold in Figma. If you're interested in a future version using another tool please contact me.
  • Does Scaffold use Figma Components that can fit into our existing design system?
    Not at this stage (May 2020). Figma Components don't reliably save prototyping connections on duplication or re-use. Scaffold relies on copy and pasting, which has consistent and reliable behavior across files and pages. I would love to rebuild Scaffold using Components so watch this space based on changes to Figma!
